title: What are some really good indie, dreamy songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m pretty obsessed with this song right now:  I listen to it every night before bed and have been for about a week and a half now. Fun fact: The video and sound were recorded at the same time! You can hear the smiles as he sings too. This band is one of those that sound just as good live as they do recorded. This song though, oh it still gives me chills. And I’ve listened to it dozens of times.  These songs sound best with good headphones by the way. The bass is beautiful, especially in the second one.

I currently have this song played on repeat:  By a musician called Andy Schauf, this song incorporates elements of chamber pop and soft rock into a folk sound. It feels so ethereal yet maintains a good level of earthiness at the same time, which is something that isn’t as common as it appears.
